observation.content: Task list has been updated with 8 item(s).

task_list.title: Phase 1: Read and understand the problem
task_list.notes: Problem understood: SkyCoord.__getattr__ gives misleading error messages for subclass properties

task_list.title: Phase 2: Set up environment and run tests
task_list.notes: Environment has build issues, but we can work directly with the source code

task_list.title: Phase 3: Explore codebase to find relevant files
task_list.notes: Found the issue in sky_coordinate.py lines 898-900 in __getattr__ method

task_list.title: Phase 4: Create test script to reproduce the issue
task_list.notes: Successfully reproduced the issue - __getattr__ is called twice, masking the real error

task_list.title: Phase 5: Analyze the problem and solution
task_list.notes: Found that checking for properties and calling super().__getattribute__ works

task_list.title: Phase 6: Implement the fix
task_list.notes: Successfully implemented fix in sky_coordinate.py lines 897-906

task_list.title: Phase 7: Verify the implementation
task_list.notes: Fix tested with mock implementations - works perfectly

task_list.title: Phase 8: Final review and testing
task_list.notes: Run existing tests to ensure no regressions
